reviewText: I love these movies!!! Good price for 3. Nice love story for couples to watch or perfect for families as well.

After watching these movies several times on the Hallmark Channel, I decided to buy them (Volumes 1 & 2). These are the kind of movies that make you want to watch them over and over again. My 9 year old granddaughter watched them while she was visiting for Thanksgiving holidays, and asked for them as a Christmas present. Of course, I bought a set for her, too. Highly recommended!!!

These are great DVDs. I love the movies and love the books even more. I recommend them to everyone. They are great movies to watch with your families. The only complaint I have is Amazon has advertized them as a 4 disc set and there are only 3 in this set. I just thought you should know what you are buying. But even with only 3 movies it is still an awesome deal.

Repackaging a good series....in 2 Volumes.
These are available separately....and in other sets. Check the pricing for best value.
Vol 1 has the first disc in WS and PS
Vol 2 has the same setup.
Each Vol has 3 of the series of 6.

I am a guy and enjoyed them...I love chicks therefore I like 'chick' flicks :) Good family viewing and written by Canadian author Janette Oke.

The only thing I found so far is that two of the discs had no cover on them. They looked like blank discs. Other than that I love the fact that these are faith based movies. I would recommend these to anyone tired of cursing and violence. There is enough of that in every day life.

So love this series. Bought a number of them for friends all over the world.

I love the series, BUT  it was supposed to be in FRENCH language track.  IT WASNT!  the advertisement is false.
wife loved this set so im happy too

Love Comes Softly follows the series of books written by Janette Oke. The stories are inspirational historic fiction set in rural western Canada. They are clean, wholesome, and slightly romantic family movies. The whole family can watch and no one need be embarrassed or worried over content. This set contains the first three movies.

These are the kind of movies that everyone can watch without being embarrassed.  The photography is excellent and we watch them over and over. Now we even use the language from the movie to communicate with each other.

Even though I purchased this volume of the series for my granddaughter, I love the entire Love Comes Softly series.  It is entertaining and shows the different relationships people can have with others.
Bought for my wife and she loves it. She has seen it at least 5 times. It is a great series.

Love the series of movies ! Would recommend to those who love Hallmark movies .
Or those looking for good hearted movies . I can watch these over and over again.
Got this for my older older sister for Christmas and she loved it!  She only watches the Hallmark channel, and Christian shows.
One of the best series of movies out there. I like the Christian themed series. I will buy the next set.
I love the series, and i can watch it over and over again. If you want a good wholesome series about living in the west and putting God first, this is for you.
I love this series so I have purchase all but 1 of the movies.  Great family movies and the Christmas one is wonderful!

Volume 1 is my favorite.  I won't tell you what happens as that will ruin it for you, but be assured that this volume and series will touch you heart in so many different ways.  The acting is great and the stories are well written.
I had never seen this series before and I appreciated the acting of David Midkiff and Katherine Heilig. He's quite a looker, too!
Everything was perfect.  The movies arrived on time and in working order. I purchased used copies and everyone of them worked as if new.

A great gift idea!  I personally have and absolutely enjoy the entire "Love Comes Softly" DVD series.  But I wanted to send at least the first three movies to my mom-in-law for her birthday this year.  It arrived on time and she thankfully has it to share with friends and the grandchildren when they visit.

My 12 yr. old granddaughter and I watched these movies together and she is anxiously awaiting shipment of others in the series.  She loves them.  I was a little disappointed that they were so different from the books, however both are good family entertainment.
I watched this series with my 10 year old granddaughter.  It has become one of her favorites and she watches it over and over again.

Item was exactly as described. Arrived very quickly. the movies in this series are EXCELLENT viewing!  Clean, wholesome, down-to-earth real love-life-heartbreak-joy type of stories, and fine acting.  Heartwarming.  I am very happy with this purchase.  I subsequently purchased the second series because I was so pleased with this purchase, and it was just as pleasant an experience, and the stories were just as tasteful and heartwarming as the first series.

... IS GREAT FAMILY ENTERTAINMENT. IT, AND THE ENTIRE SERIES OF FILMS, WERE
 INTRODUCED TO ME ON THE HALLMARK TELEVISION CHANNEL."LOVE COMES SOFTLY", THE FIRST IN THE SERIES, IS SET IN A BEAUTIFUL AND RUGGED  WESTERN TERRAIN, WHERE THE DEMANDS NEEDED TO LIVE AND WORK THERE, COULD EASILY STOP PEOPLE FROM CONSIDERING LIVING THERE AND SEND OTHERS PACKING QUICKLY.THESE CONTRAST, ALONG WITH  GOOD ACTING FROM THE ENTIRE CAST,ALONG WITH COMPLIMENTARY BACKGROUND MUSIC, WAS POWERFUL ENOUGH TO PROMPT ME TO BUY IT AND THE ENTIRE COLLECTION.MY MOM,A DIE HARD WESTERN MOVIE FAN,RECEIVED THE COLLECTION AS A GIFT FROM ME. LOVE COMES SOFTLY, IS ALSO AN INCREDIBLE LOVE STORY, SO FOR THE ROMANTIC AT HEART, AND FOR THE LOVE AND CHALLENGES THAT ARE A PART OF THIS SEGMENT ON BLENDED FAMILIES AND ON CHRISTIAN MARRIAGE ,OWNING IT,COULD BE WORTHWHILE.

These first three movies in the series are the best.  I could watch "Love Comes Softly" over and over again and never tire of it.  The acting is superb -- as is the story.  I am glad the whole series is available on DVD.

The first of the series and a wonderful set of movies.  Tender, well portrayed roles, maybe its just me, but I love this whole era.  Life seemed very difficult but so much simpler then, then it is now.
Got this for my daughter.  She loves this series and I feel good with her watching them.  Best Easter present.
Wife & I enjoyed the movie series very much. Good clean family christian based movies. It was a real joy to be able to watch without listening to vulgar language.
IT is so nice to find a series with Christian values and free of vulgarities.  Beautiful stories and well done.  Great for family nights.

I really like the Love Comes Softly Series.  They are
all very wholesome and easy to watch. Love them all.
This was the first one I watched in this series and loved it. It a family freindly kind of movie. It give a good idea of what it was like for people in that time period. I watch over and over.

No need to worry about bad language, sex scenes or graphic violence.  Just a couple of sweet love stories that aren't even afraid to mention God and how we should treat each other with kindess and respect.
The first three movies are in this series, and they are all good.....I especially love the first one!  I would include it in my top 10 movies ever!
great movies and great writer. watch them and you will want to buy the other ones out there and for the guys just want to let you no allthe guys in my house watch them and like them to.

I've wanted this series, and just never did make the purchase until I received an Amazon Gift Card this Christmas.  I decided to go ahead and give them a try after reading all of the great reviews.  This series was even better than I thought it would be.  We enjoyed them as a family, that's including my husband and 12 yr old son.  They are not just chick flicks!  Very pleased!  I recommend to anyone wanting good wholesome Christian entertainment.
thank you for this wonderful gift. This will make a great and wonderful gift family/ friend enjoyed and will enjoy watching
Our 15year old grand daughter loves this series. Glad I could find them...more importantly I could afford to get them for her
I bought the video since for my wife and granddaughter since they loved the series. They have watched it numerous times.

We absolutely love the "Love Comes Softly" Series. I don't know how many times we have watched it. It is the first show I remember Kathryn Heigl starring in and she is wonderful. It is "Little House" clean with wonderful story lines
My wife says that I am a hard man and yet this series softens me and makes me appreciate the God that loves me and the wife I have who is forever faithful and true.
I am a semi-retired pastor. I have watched not a few DVD movies over the past few years. These are without doubt the best of all.
The love comes softly series is one of the best series I have ever watched. The actors and the writers are the best ever in my opinion

Is there something like a christian Western?  Yes, there is!  And here you have it!  And it's no dumb tearjerker.  Its truly a great story.  And if it will jerk a tear form you then this will not be dumb.

I purchased each DVD separately over time because I could not afford all at once; however, if I could do it over, I would save and buy them all at once. This is the very best family saga you will ever hope to find. I fell in love with each character and once I got the complete set (8) I watched them all again in four nights from beginning to end...a wonderful experience in Faith and Love!

The first three movies in the Love Comes Softly series are far and away my favorites. The stories are so unique, and the two main characters (Marty and Clark) are exquisitely portrayed by Katherine Heigl and Dale Midkiff. I read this entire series long before I watched the movies, and while I was a little disappointed that the movies did not follow the books, I found that I liked them in a different way.

Michael Landon, Jr. took a strong series written by one of the leading inspirational writers, Janette Oke, and turned it into compelling television. Though the movies don't contain violence or much drama-packed action, they do just what they're supposed to do: capture a viewer's attention and draw them into a well-told story.
janette oke wrote the best series about love the old days God and faith. i suggest you read all the series. they will make you cry and happy and give you hope!!
I watch these movies over and over again and again.. I cant get enough of them it seems like..

I originally bought a seperate dvd in a discount store "Love takes Wing" which I just loved.  In watching this, I discovered that there is a whole series of these and Michael Landon's son produced them.  Because of this I searched Amazon and found the series.  I purchased them separately in volume 1 and later volume 2 as it was cheaper to purchase that way than the whole set together.  Each volumn has 3 movies at 13.99 for volume 1 and 13.99 for volume II whereas the complete set of 6 movies together is 70.00.  Anyhow, wonderful movies, family entertaining, religious context which is sometimes forgotten in today's world. UPLifting and great story content.  I Watch these over at times among othere in my 2000 movie collection.

Have purchased 7 DVDs of the 8 volumes in the Love Comes Softly series.  Excellent series: clean, wholesome stories with Christian morals.  LOVE THESE STORIES.  Highly recommend to all.  Waiting on the 8th volume to be released on DVD for purchase.  All DVDs were good quality and shipped timely.  Wish all 8 could have been in a compact set rather than individual DVDs.  But I have mine!  As always with Amazon.com, I had good service in a timely manner.  Will continue to shop with them.  Better prices!

The idea to keep in mind is that the values being advanced here are Christian.
But beyond that,these are feel-good pictures,starting with Mr Dale Midkiff. The unfortunate thing for me is that I did not see these for what they are 'till when they first came out.
The only disc I have yet watched lost sound, but once I back tracked a chapter, the sound was fine.  Technical glitch or permanent problem, I couldn't tell you.
I  found  the  series  quite  thought  provoking  and  at  the  same  time  entertaining .  The  colour  ; sound  and  presentation  of  top  quality

I stumbled on this movie series on the Hallmark Channel one Sunday afternoon when they were showing several episodes back to back. I'm always lamenting how difficult it is to find good wholesome movies for our family to watch and knew immediately this was a series to invest in. I ordered both Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 (all six DVDs) and had them a week or so later. Over the course of three weekends, my girls (ages 7, 10 and 15) and I watched all six together. They would have watched all nine hours in a row if I'd let them -- that's how much they liked them. They enjoyed the story lines, but they also were interested to see what it was like to live back in the 1800s. And of course the emphasis on depending on God and trusting Him are a great lesson for all of us in this modern day of self-reliance. I HIGHLY recommend this series to anyone -- both adults and kids. Your kids will watch them over and over.
I really had one problem with these...when I started to show them the closed caption came up and I had to use another player to take it off.

Hat's off to Michael Landon Jr. Everything he puts his camera too turns to gold! Love all of his stuff! Wether you have read these books or not these DVD's are beautiful, touching and sweet. Keep up the good work Michael and God Bless.

I bought these as a gift for my Mom after I had watched these movies on the Hallmark channel, which she does not get.  They are such tender, touching stories and the characters are really believable.  I also really enjoyed the scenery and thinking about how life was in those days.  I would recomend this series for anyone.

It's great to get a good value.  It arrived just in time for Christmas.  Thank you for being so fast.  It worked out perfect.  I purchased it for a invalid friend of mine who was going to be alone for Christmas.  She watched all the films on Christmas day and loved them.

Love Comes Softly Series, Vol. 1 In the tradition of tv shows like "Little House" and "The Waltons" comes a wonderful tale. Based on a series of books by Janette Oke. Directed by Michael Landon Jr. who clearly is following in his father's footsteps. Women and teen girls will love, men should not shrug this off as another chick flick. A wonderful timepiece that shows Christian values. Katherine Heigl and Dale Midkiff deliver with wonderful performances.

I bought these for my wife and she loves them.... she watches them over and over.... and over again.... each Volume contains three DVD disk....

Volume 1 has the first 3 movies, Love Comes Softly, Love's Enduring Promise, and Love's Long Journey
Volume 2 has the last 3 movies, Love's Abiding Joy, Love's Unending Legacy, and Love's Unfolding Dream.

These are good family movies and just proves too that Hollywood doesn't need to have any sex or violence to make a very good five star movie.... Thank you Michael Landon Jr. for such a good job..... well done...

Oklahoma City

The Love Comes Softly Series are some of the best movies ever made.  The themes are well played out and there are several threads that run through each movie, with all loose ends tied up by the ending.  These movies are great for any age group, male and female.  The setting and telling of the stories is so real that one can actually believe that they are true. Good moral fiber and none of the nonsense that is so prevalent in most of today's movies.  Highly Recommended!!!
THIS SERIES IS A VERY HEART WARM STORY. ALL THREE DISCS ARE GOOD. GOOD SERVICE, FAST SERVICE. REASONABLE PRICE. IT PLAYED WELL ON MY BLUE RAY PLAYER. THANK YOU. NO PROBLEM WITH THE SELLER.
Great movies.

Love all the movies. Happy to be able to own them to watch over and over and over. Sometimes you wish you could be transported back to that time but those days were a really challenging time in history.  Our pioneers should be honored for what they set in motion for us, especially those strong women.
It's a must see; very good movie.
EXCELLENT QUALITY WITH CLEAR PICTURE.
Bought as a gift.

Excellent condition.  I love this series. I had seen it before. I had everyone already but the first disc got broken so I ordered what I thought was just the first disc but got the first three episodes. I am very pleased with the price. Just love this wholesome series. A must buy for great family viewing.
This was such a great movie series. Don't hesitate to buy it!
Love them all!!!
